1.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's, Rachel is sitting in the living room and Phoebe is
standing in the kitchen as the phone rings.

lines.Line: Pheebs? Could you get that? Please
Why? Just 'cause you're too lazy to get up off your touchie?

No! No! It's just that all the people in the entire world that I
want to talk to are right here

lines.Character: [Cut to Las Vegas, Joey is on the phone and wearing his gladiator costume
lines.Line: Cut to Las Vegas, Joey is on the phone and wearing his gladiator costume.

Hey Pheebs! Listen, uh can you do me a favor? I forgot the pin number to
my ATM card can, can you get it for me
Uh, I scratched it on the ATM machine down on the corner
(to Joey) Ooh, do you want to talk to Chandler
(To Phoebe) Is that Joey?! (She nods yes) Let me talk to him

No! (She nods no to Chandler) Because he didn't believe in my movie! Which
is a big mistake because it is real! Real
/strong> Hey! Tribbiani! Get back to work! Break time's over

Uhh, my stunt double. Yeah, and y'know, he's getting a little too familiar
for my tastes

(To Phoebe) Y'know what? I have been trying to apologize to him all
week! If he's not gonna let me do it on the phone, I'm gonna go down there and do it in
person
Uhh Pheebs, I heard that. Can you put him on
Yeah! (She hands the phone to Chandler.

No-no-no-no, I've supported you one hundred percent and I want to
prove that to you in person
I got that! I forgive ya! Don't come out here
Forgive me? You haven't been taking my calls in a week
Well, I'm totally over it Chandler. Friends forever! Don't come out here
(To Joey) Would you mind doing a picture with us
Uh, Entertainment Tonight. [Cut to Chandler] Yeah, okay so, good talking to ya and don't come out here. All right. (Hangs up the phone and poses for that picture.

2.SceneDescription:
An airplane cabin, Phoebe has the aisle seat, Chandler the window, and Monica's
stuck in that horrible middle seat.

lines.Line:
So, so far is this trip to Vegas better or worse than the trip to
London
So it's pretty much the same Pheebs

Okay, what about after I give you these candies? (Hands them each one
from her purse.
Yeah, I guess it's a little better now
Yeah, I guess it's a little better now

Ah-ha! Okay, (takes out a notepad) Las Vegas 1, London 0! I'll be right
back. (Gets up and heads aft.
Can I give you a present now

Okay! (He grabs his carryon and starts rummaging through it.) Oh man!
Don’t tell me I did this
I love the "I forgot the present" fake out

How do you feel about the, "I really did forgot the present,
please forgive me" not fake out

Oh that's okay. Don’t worry about it, you can give it to me when we
get back

Ohh that's the worse thing that can happen on an anniversary
ever

Ohh that's the worse thing that can happen on an anniversary
ever

(sitting down) Oh good! All right, so you decided to tell him about the
Richard thing
(To Monica under her breath) Simmons! Go with Simmons

Okay, I umm, I ran into Richard yesterday and he asked me if I wanted to
go for a bite and I did. The only reason I didn't tell you is because I knew you'd get mad
and I didn't want to spoil our anniversary
(talking out of the side of his mouth) I'm not mad
(talking out of the side of his mouth) I'm not mad

Oh yeah! Yeah, so you-you bumped into Richard! You grabbed a bite!
It's no big deal. (He still ain't happy.

3.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's, the scene is continued from where we left off before the
break.

lines.Line: Uh, yeah, if you want too

So do I. (Slowly walks in.) Okay Rach, before anything happens (He takes
off his coat) I just want to lay down a couple of ground rules. (Turns back to face her.)
This is just about tonight. I don't to go through with this if it's going to raise the
question of "Us." (Rachel's confused) Okay? I just want this to be (Kicks off
his left shoe) about what it is! (Kicks off the other one.
And um, what-what is that Ross
And um, what-what is that Ross
The physical act of love. (Hisses at her.

Oh so-so you weren't trying to entice me just now with your-your
nakedness
(gasps) Oh God, you saw me?! Oh
(gasps) Oh God, you saw me?! Oh
You weren't trying to entice me with your nakedness

Noo!! No! You thought, you actually thought I wanted to have sex with
you?

No! No! (Grabs his coat) No! (Grabs a shoe.) No-no-no-no. (Grabs the other
one and heads for the door.
Ohh wow! I’m sorry, but Ross you kicked off your shoes
Ohh wow! I’m sorry, but Ross you kicked off your shoes
Can we, can we just forget this ever happened
Yes of course, absolutely! You're right. I'm sorry
Yes of course, absolutely! You're right. I'm sorry
All right I guess I'm, gonna go pack. (Starts to leave

Okay. Oh wait! One more thing umm, do-do we still need to uh settle the
question of "us?

4.SceneDescription: An aircraft cabin, Ross and Rachel are on their way to Vegas.

lines.Line:
(taking off her sweater) Okay umm, Ross? I'm-I'm really warm, so I'm
going to be taking off my sweater. Now, I'm just letting you know that this is not
an invitation to the physical act of love
I'm sorry. I'm done. I'm done
I'm sorry. I'm done. I'm done
Y'know, last night was embarrassing for you too
No, not really. I mean you've seen me naked hundreds of times
Uh-huh. But it was a first for the rest of my building
Uh-huh. But it was a first for the rest of my building

Okay. All right, that's true! But y'know I just don't embarrass that
easily
No, I don't! Ross, I think I'm just a more secure person than you are

(loudly so that everyone can hear) Hey lady! I don't care how much you
want it! Okay?! I am not gonna to have sex with you in the bathroom! (Rachel
sinks lower on her chair trying to hide.

5.SceneDescription: The casino bar, Phoebe and Monica are sitting at the bar, while Wayne Newton's signature song Danke Schoen is playing in the background.

lines.Line: I can't believe this! This is like the worst night ever

Y'know Monica you had a minor setback in your relationship with
Chandler. Big deal! It's only Chandler. (Monica turns and stares at her.) I am so
sorry

This is crazy! I mean, it's such a stupid argument. I don't even wanna
see Richard again

So go fix it! Go find Chandler! He's probably up in your room! Tell him
that you're sorry and that you love him

Y'know what? You're right Phoebe. You're right. Thank you! (Gets up to
find Chandler.

Y'know what? You're right Phoebe. You're right. Thank you! (Gets up to
find Chandler.

Sure! (When Monica gets close to the door.) (Yelling) Yeah! Las Vegas,
number one

lines.Character:
[Cut to the casino, Monica is walking through it past the craps table when she notices
a chip on the floor. She picks it up and heads to the table
lines.Line:
Cut to the casino, Monica is walking through it past the craps table when she notices
a chip on the floor. She picks it up and heads to the table.

Anybody lose this? (Holds up the chip and the woman next to her shakes
her head no.

Comin' out. Place your bet. (Monica does so.) Dice are out. (The
woman next to Monica rolls the dice.) Double or nothin'! Pay the front line! (Monica won
and doubled the chip.

6.SceneDescription: Caesar's Palace Casino, Joey is approaching one of the blackjack tables on his quest to make enough money for his movie.

lines.Line: (to the dealer) Can I change a hundred? (He hands him his chip.
Changing one hundred! (Gives him the change.) Good luck sir

Hit me! (He does so.) Ohh man! (Joey busts and loses all the money, but
when the dealer starts to collect the cards Joey notices something.) Wait! (He holds his
hand next to the dealer's hand.

lines.Character: [Cut to Chandler's room, Joey is relaying to Chandler his amazing discovery
lines.Line: Cut to Chandler's room, Joey is relaying to Chandler his amazing discovery.

Chandler! You are not gonna believe this! I have found my identical
hand twin

What's it sound like? It's a guy with my identical hands! It was
incredible! Chandler, the dealer's hands were exactly like me! It-it was like looking at
my hands in a mirror
Are you sure you weren't (pause) looking at your hands in a mirror

Don’t you see what this means?! I can forget about that stupid movie.
I'm gonna be a millionaire

Look, I don't have it all worked out yet, but it's gotta mean big money!
Come on! Identical hands
Again I must go back to, how
Again I must go back to, how

This is Vegas man! People will pay to see freaky stuff! Okay, how much
would you pay to see this hand (Holds up his left hand) twice? Huh
(Pause) Y'know, I-I can't really put a price on that Joe
(Pause) Y'know, I-I can't really put a price on that Joe
Hey, are you unsupporting me again

No! No! I support you 100%! I just didn't, I didn't get it right away.
Y'know now I'm caught up! Identical hand twins! It's a million-dollar idea

lines.Character:
(Joey starts to leave to embark on his genius moneymaking scheme, but is freaked out
slightly when as he goes to open the door, there's a mysterious knock. He calms himself
down and opens the door to reveal Phoebe
lines.Line:
Joey starts to leave to embark on his genius moneymaking scheme, but is freaked out
slightly when as he goes to open the door, there's a mysterious knock. He calms himself
down and opens the door to reveal Phoebe.
I found my identical hand twin

Ohh, you are so lucky! (To Chandler) Hey! So, where's Monica? Did
you guys make up
But she just came up here
I wonder where she is. That is so weird
Yeah, well, she's probably talking to Richard

Would you stop that! Do you wanna know the first thing she said when she
came back from her lunch with Richard? She didn't feel anything for him. She loves you

Yes! Now, she feels terrible! She really wants to make up! You gotta
find her
Okay. (He gets up and goes to find her.
Okay. (He gets up and goes to find her.

Good. (After he leaves, she puts on Joey's gladiator helmet and checks
herself out in the mirror) I should really start wearing hats

7.SceneDescription:
That same plane cabin, Ross is working on a crossword puzzle and Rachel is
asleep against his shoulder. She shifts a little bit and Ross suddenly gets an idea. An
evil idea when he looks at his pen. Then we have a little time lapse, the plane has landed
and everyone is disembarking. The flight attendant is saying bye-bye to everyone.

lines.Line:
(to another passenger) Welcome to Las
Vegas

lines.Character:
(Rachel approaches and we see the fruits of Ross's evil plan. He has drawn a moustache
and beard on Rachel. The flight attendant just ignores it
lines.Line:
Rachel approaches and we see the fruits of Ross's evil plan. He has drawn a moustache
and beard on Rachel. The flight attendant just ignores it.

(To Rachel) Thank you! (Not sure of
herself) Enjoy your flight
Yes, I did. Thank you very much, it was excellent. (Disembarks
(To Ross) Hope you had a nice flight
(To Ross) Hope you had a nice flight

8.SceneDescription: The craps table, Monica is on a big roll.

lines.Line: All right baby, come on! (Rolls the dice) Yes! Yes! I am on fire
(walking by with his luggage) See you later Mon
Wait Chandler, what are you doing?
Wait Chandler, what are you doing?
What does it look like? I'm going home

What? Wait! Why? (He turns and heads for the door and she chases after
him.) Chandler! Chandler! Wait! I’m sorry, I was just playing for one second! I was
trying to find you to tell you that, look if you don't want me to see Richard again, I
won't! He means nothing to me

Come on! I was there! (He's propped up with his hand on a statute of a
naked guy. He winces and pulls his hand away.) I know he's the love of your life

Really! (They hug and kiss) All right? Let's forget about this going
home stuff and celebrate our anniversary. (She picks up his suitcase.) Okay, this is
empty
Yeah, I wanted to make a dramatic scene, but I hate packing

9.SceneDescription:
Ross and Rachel's hotel room, Rachel is still trying to get the ink off and
Ross is on the phone to the company. Wait a minute, why exactly are they sharing a hotel
room? Didn't they like break-up or something? Did I miss a memo? Or maybe, it's just
foreshadowing things to come. Who knows? Maybe the answer's at the bottom of the page.
Then again, maybe it isn't and it's just one of those things TV writers just don't
explain. Anyhoo…

lines.Line:
(on the phone) Yes, hello. I have a question. Umm, I used your pen to draw
on my friend's face. (Listens) A beard and a moustache. (Listens and laughs) Thank you.
(Rachel turns around and glares at him.) No, she didn't think so. (Listens) I know
it's like (turns and sees Rachel staring at him and quickly changes the subject) anyway,
umm well make-up didn't cover it and we've tried everything to get it off and nothing's
worked. What-what do we do? (Listens) Yeah. (Listens) Uh-huh. (Listens) Yeah. (Listens)
Oh! Okay. (Listens) Okay, thank you! (Rachel gets excited at his tone.) (Hangs up the
phone) Yeah, it's not coming off
What?! What else did he say
What?! What else did he say

Umm, he said he thought I was funny. So…(Rachel stares at him.) Okay,
look-look umm, let's just go downstairs, we'll have some fun, and you will forget all
about it

Ross, no! There is no way I am leaving this room looking like
this
Oh, come on! Rach, it's-it's not that bad
Oh, come on! Rach, it's-it's not that bad
Ross, I am a human doodle!
Ross, I am a human doodle!

Look, just because some idiot drew on your face doesn't mean you shouldn't
have any fun! Okay? And besides, hey-hey-hey no one is even gonna look at you.
Okay? This is Vegas! Hello! There are tons of other freaks here! (Rachel turns around and
glares at him.) There are tons…of…freaks here. No other. No. Come on! No one
will notice, I swear
Okay, there was some staring and pointing
Okay, I need a, I need a drink! (Makes a beeline for the mini-bar.

Oh, hey y'know, they-they really overcharge you for that stuff. (Rachel
glares at him.) But who cares?! Because it's all on me! (Rachel reaches into the fridge
and pulls out two handfuls of those mini booze bottles.) (Watching her.) That is, one big
drink!

(she's finished reliving the fridge of its entire alcohol content.)
Macadamia nut

(she's finished reliving the fridge of its entire alcohol content.)
Macadamia nut
(looking at the price list) Umm… Wow! That's-that's some pricey nut
Really like those Macadamia nuts, huh

Nope! (She puts one in her mouth and spits it out, then does it again in
another direction.

10.SceneDescription: The Men's room, Joey is entering and sees his hand twin washing his hands.

lines.Line:
Oh-oh-oh, yeah! (He grabs some towels and takes them to him.) That's
right, you take good care of those babies
Oh-ho, yeah. Yeah, the hand guy
Okay, so what are we going to do about this hand twin thing?

Look, you and I have been given a gift. Okay? We have to do something with
it. Like-like, hand modeling! Huh? Or-or magic! And you know NASA's gonna wanna
talk to us
(tries to leave) I have to get back to
(tries to leave) I have to get back to

(stopping him) Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Whoa-whoa! We could have our own show! Y'know we could clap our hands together people will love it! Huh? And-and-and I wrote a song for us! (Singing, to the tune of This Land is Your Land) This hand is your hand! This hand is my hand! Oh wait, that's your hand! No wait, it's my hand!
(following him) But you haven't even heard the chorus

11.SceneDescription:
The Craps Table, Monica is still on her roll, only this time Chandler's with
her and she has a huge crowd of people around.

lines.Line:
(shaking the dice) A new pair of shoes for the Chan-Chan man! (Rolls the
dice.) Yes
Yes! I've-I've never seen a roll like this in my life
That's right baby! Okay, what do I want now
Okay, ah umm, ah, a 8. Ah, a 6
Okay, ah umm, ah, a 8. Ah, a 6
Pick a number! That is your only job
Pick a number! That is your only job
If you get this one, we buy everybody here a steak dinner

(To Chandler) We're not really gonna buy these people steak dinners are
we
Okay, good! Okay, what do I want now
(To Chandler) Don't you let her go! You're a lucky guy

Thank you, Mister Drunken Gambler! Okay, you get this and uh, we get
the biggest suite in the place! (Everyone cheers) Wait-wait-wait-wait! We (motions
to Monica and him.) get the biggest suite in the place
All right, biggest suite in the place. Come on! (Rolls the dice.

(sees the roll) Yes!! I love you! I can't even remember what we were
fighting about

Oh, that's because I had lunch with Rich—Me neither! Okay, what do
I want now

Oh, that's because I had lunch with Rich—Me neither! Okay, what do
I want now
Hard 8?! We should call it easy 8

Okay, okay, I tell you what. You roll another hard eight; (pause) and
we get married here tonight
Shut up!! It just got interesting

12.SceneDescription:
The slot machines, Phoebe is still feeding quarters into the one-armed bandit
as the lurker peeks over the top of the machines.

lines.Line:
Oh well, lost again. (She gets up and slowly moves away. The lurker
scurries in and takes her spot, only this time Phoebe set a trap for her and catches her
in the act.) That's it! You and me, outside

I don't want to see you lose a chunk of that pretty blond
hair

lines.Character:
(They start smacking each other's cups, but Phoebe notices a security guard
approaching
lines.Line:
They start smacking each other's cups, but Phoebe notices a security guard
approaching.

Be cool! (They both pretend to have a nice conversation as the guard
walks by, but after he leaves they both start fighting again.) Okay lady, your lurking
days are over

Yeah, from now on everyone you lurk, I'm gonna lurk first! You move on
to someone else, I'm gonna be one step ahead of you, every single time! And then I'll be
on your ass every hour of every day 'til Monday, because that's when I go home. When do
you leave
What time? Maybe we can share a cab
What time? Maybe we can share a cab

13.SceneDescription: The slot machines, we see some guy not having any luck. Both Phoebe and the Lurker are lurking him and each stick their heads around the corner at different times This is all set to that Pink Panther song. Finally the guy gives up and walks past the lurker's position, thus giving her the advantage. She scurries in and quickly drops a coin in the slot before Phoebe gets there. Phoebe arrives slightly later and pulls the arm just after the lurker deposits the coin and wins.

lines.Line: I won! I won! I finally won
I won! That was my quarter
Fine! Here! Take a hike toots! (Gives back her quarter.

(to the guard) Excuse me, sir! This lady played my quarter,
this is my money. (Motions to the jackpot.
She sells drugs to kids. (The guard looks at the lurker.
How about we talk about this over dinner
How about we talk about this over dinner
Okay lady, you're out of here

No! No, you can't arrest me! No!! I won't go back! I won't go back to
that hell hole!

14.SceneDescription:
A blackjack table, Joey is moving in to try and get his hand twin (who's
dealing) to join him in his evil plot to rule the world!

lines.Line: (sitting down) Ahhh! (Slides his hands across the table.

No-no, I don't really have any money. Not yet, anyway… (Shakes his
hands.
You can't sit here if you're not gonna play
You can't sit here if you're not gonna play

(throws down a small wad of money, and as his hand twin starts to unfold
it, Joey once again brings attention to their special gift to the world. {Y'know, looking
at it now, they really don't have that similar of hands. Joey's are bigger.}) Ooh-ho-ho!
(The dealer stares at him and he stops.

(entering and sitting down at the table.) Hello. My name is Regina
Phalange. I'm a businesswoman in town on business. Would you like to see my card? (Looks
down) Ooh, what did I do with my file-a-facts? I must've left it in conference room B

Oh my God! May I just say that you two gentlemen have the exact same
hands! They're identical! Now, I've never seen anything like that in the business world

Uhh, Ms. Phalange, may I ask you a question as an impartial person at-at
this table

Wouldn't you pay good money to see these identical hands showcased in some
type of a uh, entertainment venue

(To Joey) If you leave now, I will chop off my hand and give
it too you

lines.Character: (The security guard from before approaches and Phoebe tries to turn her back on him.
lines.Line: The security guard from before approaches and Phoebe tries to turn her back on him.)
(To Phoebe) Didn't I just throw you out of here
(To Phoebe) Didn't I just throw you out of here
No, you threw out Phoebe. I'm Ms. Regina Phalange. Phalange
Come on, lady! (Starts to escort her out.
Come on, lady! (Starts to escort her out.
Please, please take him too. (Motions to Joey.

Me?! Oh come on, man! You can't do this! Come on! (Being dragged out by
the guard) I'm your hand twin!
